downloadTitle: Lync 2013 Headers for SIP Trunk provider billing
downloadDescription: The implementation of these headers will enable SIP trunk providers to more effectively bill for their services for calls forwarded or transferred to another PSTN number while enabling some level of fraud prevention/detection in the SIP trunk provider network (identifying that the outbound call is indeed from a number on their network).

downloadFile.name: Lync 2013 Headers for SIP trunk provider billing.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/2/4/5/245583a7-e9e1-403b-bd15-ab711c7df744/Lync 2013 Headers for SIP trunk provider billing.docx

detailsSection: The implementation of these headers will enable SIP trunk providers to more effectively bill for their services for calls forwarded or transferred to another PSTN number while enabling some level of fraud prevention/detection in the SIP trunk provider network (identifying that the outbound call is indeed from a number on their network).
detailsSection_file_name: Lync 2013 Headers for SIP trunk provider billing.docx
systemRequirementsSection: • One file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
